Package rs.raf.specification

Interface IDirectoryHandlerSpecification<T>

public interface IDirectoryHandlerSpecification<T>
Methods to use when using DirectoryHandler

  • Method Details

    • setWorkingDirectory

      void setWorkingDirectory(String rootPathString) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, GeneralSecurityException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException, IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException
      Sets the root directory of the current session (can contain multiple repositories).
      Parameters:
      rootPathString - path to the root directory.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.
      GeneralSecurityException - if Google Drive fails to authenticate.

    • copyFiles

      void copyFiles(String filePathsString, String copyDestinationDirectoryString, boolean overwrite) throws IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxFileCountExceededException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException
      Copies one or more files at the path(s) specified to the destination directory path with the option of overwriting. Multiple paths are delimited with -more-. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      Parameters:
      filePathsString - Path(s) of the file to copy. Multiple paths are delimited with -more-. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      copyDestinationDirectoryString - Path to the destination directory. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      overwrite - whether to overwrite existing files or directories.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxFileCountExceededException - if max file count for directory is exceeded.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException - if path starts with a non-existent repository name.

    • createConfig

      void createConfig(String repositoryName, String configString) throws IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.ValueInConfigCannotBeLessThanOneException
      Creates a config in the specified repository. Config can be parsed as null to create a default config, or as a custom config string.
      Parameters:
      repositoryName - name of the repository to create the config in
      configString - String representation of custom config. Parameters in config string are delimited by ;. Parameters are split into keys and values by =. Possible parameter keys: maxRepositorySize, excludedExtensions, directoriesWithMaxFileCount. maxRepositorySize is a long of bytes that is the maximum size of specified repository. Example: 1024. excludedExtensions is a comma delimited string of extensions which the program will not allow files to be created with. Example: exe,bat directoriesWithMaxFileCount is a comma delimited list of - delimited string which represent a key value pair of a directory name and the max file count that would be allowed to store inside. Example: dir1-25,dir2-50 Full config string example: maxRepositorySize=2048;excludedExtensions=jar,zip;directoriesWithMaxFileCount=exampleDir1-75,exampleDir2-100 Not all parameters have to be specified. Can be parsed as null in order to create a default config with maxRepositorySize=1073741824.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException - if path starts with a non-existent repository name.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.ValueInConfigCannotBeLessThanOneException - if value to put in config is less than one.

    • createDirectories

      void createDirectories(String directoryPathsString) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxFileCountExceededException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException
      Creates one or more directories at the path(s) specified. Multiple paths are delimited with -more-. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name. If parent directories don't exist, they will be created in accordance with config rules.
      Parameters:
      directoryPathsString - Path(s) of the directories to create. Multiple paths are delimited with -more-. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxFileCountExceededException - if max file count for directory is exceeded.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException - if path starts with a non-existent repository name.

    • createFiles

      void createFiles(String filePathsString) throws IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxFileCountExceededException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.FileExtensionException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxRepositorySizeExceededException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException
      Creates one or more files at the path(s) specified. Multiple paths are delimited with -more-. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name. If parent directories don't exist, they will be created in accordance with config rules.
      Parameters:
      filePathsString - Path(s) of the files to create. Multiple paths are delimited with -more-. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxFileCountExceededException - if max file count for directory is exceeded.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException - if path starts with a non-existent repository name.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.FileExtensionException - if file has an extension that is forbidden in the config file.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxRepositorySizeExceededException - if max repository size is exceeded.

    • createRepository

      void createRepository(String repositoryName, String configString) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.ValueInConfigCannotBeLessThanOneException
      Creates a repository with the specified name and config
      Parameters:
      repositoryName - name of the repository to create
      configString - String representation of custom config. Parameters in config string are delimited by ;. Parameters are split into keys and values by =. Possible parameter keys: maxRepositorySize, excludedExtensions, directoriesWithMaxFileCount. maxRepositorySize is a long of bytes that is the maximum size of specified repository. Example: 1024. excludedExtensions is a comma delimited string of extensions which the program will not allow files to be created with. Example: exe,bat directoriesWithMaxFileCount is a comma delimited list of - delimited string which represent a key value pair of a directory name and the max file count that would be allowed to store inside. Example: dir1-25,dir2-50 Full config string example: maxRepositorySize=2048;excludedExtensions=jar,zip;directoriesWithMaxFileCount=exampleDir1-75,exampleDir2-100 Not all parameters have to be specified. Can be parsed as null in order to create a default config with maxRepositorySize=1073741824.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException - if path starts with a non-existent repository name.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if config is in bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.ValueInConfigCannotBeLessThanOneException - if value to put in config is less than one.

    • deleteFiles

      void deleteFiles(String filePathsString) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException, IOException
      Deletes one or more files or directories at the specified path(s). Multiple paths are delimited with -more-. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      Parameters:
      filePathsString - Path(s) to the files or directories to delete. Multiple paths are delimited with -more-. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.

    • downloadFiles

      void downloadFiles(String filePathsString, String downloadDestinationDirectoryString, boolean overwrite) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxFileCountExceededException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException
      Deletes one or more files or directories at the specified path(s). Multiple paths are delimited with -more-. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name. Downloading a Google Drive directory is not supported.
      Parameters:
      filePathsString - Path(s) to the files or directories to download. Multiple paths are delimited with -more-. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      downloadDestinationDirectoryString - Path to the destination directory. Can be absolute or relative.
      overwrite - whether to overwrite existing files or directories.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxFileCountExceededException - if max file count for directory is exceeded.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException - if path starts with a non-existent repository name.

    • getConfig

      DirectoryHandlerConfig getConfig(String repositoryName) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxFileCountExceededException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException
      Gets the config from the specified repository.
      Parameters:
      repositoryName - name of the repository to get the config from.
      Returns:
      DirectoryHandlerConfig from the specified repository.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxFileCountExceededException - if max file count for directory is exceeded.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException - if path starts with a non-existent repository name.

    • getDirectorySize

      long getDirectorySize(String directoryPathString) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, IOException
      Gets the size of a directory at the specified path. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      Parameters:
      directoryPathString - Path to the directory of which to get the size of. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      Returns:
      long size of directory in bytes.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.

    • getFileCount

      int getFileCount(String directoryPathString) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, IOException
      Gets the file count of a directory at the specified path. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      Parameters:
      directoryPathString - Path to the directory of which to get the file count of. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      Returns:
      int file count of directory.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.

    • getFileListInDirectory

      List<T> getFileListInDirectory(String directoryPathString, boolean recursive, boolean includeFiles, boolean includeDirectories, SortingType sortingType, OrderType orderType) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException, IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException
      Gets the file list for specified search parameters.
      Parameters:
      directoryPathString - Path of directory to search. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      recursive - Whether to search recursively.
      includeFiles - Whether to include files.
      includeDirectories - Whether to include directories.
      sortingType - SortingType enum element of the method of sorting to apply. Possible sorting types (SortingType): NONE, NAME, DATE_CREATED, DATE_MODIFIED, SIZE
      orderType - OrderType enum element of the order type. Can be ASCENDING, DESCENDING.
      Returns:
      List of files in search result.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.

    • getFileSize

      long getFileSize(String filePathString) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxFileCountExceededException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException
      Gets the size of a file at the specified path. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      Parameters:
      filePathString - Path to the file of which to get the size of. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      Returns:
      long size of file in bytes.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxFileCountExceededException - if max file count for directory is exceeded.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException - if path starts with a non-existent repository name.

    • getFilesForDateRange

      List<T> getFilesForDateRange(String directoryPathString, String startDate, String endDate, boolean dateCreated, boolean dateModified, boolean recursive, boolean includeFiles, boolean includeDirectories, SortingType sortingType, OrderType orderType) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException, ParseException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException
      Gets the file list for specified search parameters.
      Parameters:
      directoryPathString - Path of the directory to search.
      startDate - dd/MM/yyyy formatted string of the low date limit for search.
      endDate - dd/MM/yyyy formatted string of the upper date limit for search.
      dateCreated - whether to consider file creation date in search.
      dateModified - whether to consider file modification date in search.
      recursive - whether to search recursively.
      includeFiles - whether to include files.
      includeDirectories - whether to include directories.
      sortingType - SortingType enum element of the method of sorting to apply. Possible sorting types (SortingType): NONE, NAME, DATE_CREATED, DATE_MODIFIED, SIZE.
      orderType - OrderType enum element of the order type. Can be ASCENDING, DESCENDING.
      Returns:
      List of files in search result.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.
      ParseException - if unable to parse strings as dates.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.

    • getFilesForExcludedExtensions

      List<T> getFilesForExcludedExtensions(String directoryPathString, String searchExcludedExtensionsString, boolean recursive, boolean includeFiles, boolean includeDirectories, SortingType sortingType, OrderType orderType) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException
      Gets the file list for specified search parameters.
      Parameters:
      directoryPathString - Path of the directory to search. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      searchExcludedExtensionsString - comma delimited string of the extensions to exclude from search.
      recursive - whether to search recursively.
      includeFiles - whether to include files.
      includeDirectories - whether to include directories.
      sortingType - SortingType enum element of the method of sorting to apply. Possible sorting types (SortingType): NONE, NAME, DATE_CREATED, DATE_MODIFIED, SIZE.
      orderType - OrderType enum element of the order type. Can be ASCENDING, DESCENDING.
      Returns:
      List of files in search result.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.

    • getFilesForExtensions

      List<T> getFilesForExtensions(String directoryPathString, String searchExtensionsString, boolean recursive, boolean includeFiles, boolean includeDirectories, SortingType sortingType, OrderType orderType) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException
      Gets the file list for specified search parameters
      Parameters:
      directoryPathString - Path of the directory to search. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      searchExtensionsString - comma delimited string of the extensions to include in search.
      recursive - whether to search recursively.
      includeFiles - whether to include files.
      includeDirectories - whether to include directories.
      sortingType - SortingType enum element of the method of sorting to apply. Possible sorting types (SortingType): NONE, NAME, DATE_CREATED, DATE_MODIFIED, SIZE.
      orderType - OrderType enum element of the order type. Can be ASCENDING, DESCENDING.
      Returns:
      List of files in search result.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.

    • getFilesForExtensionsAndExcludedExtensions

      List<T> getFilesForExtensionsAndExcludedExtensions(String directoryPathString, String searchExtensionsString, String searchExcludedExtensionsString, boolean recursive, boolean includeFiles, boolean includeDirectories, SortingType sortingType, OrderType orderType) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException
      Gets the file list for specified search parameters
      Parameters:
      directoryPathString - Path of the directory to search. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      searchExtensionsString - comma delimited string of the extensions to include in search.
      searchExcludedExtensionsString - comma delimited string of the extensions to exclude from search.
      recursive - whether to search recursively.
      includeFiles - whether to include files.
      includeDirectories - whether to include directories.
      sortingType - SortingType enum element of the method of sorting to apply. Possible sorting types (SortingType): NONE, NAME, DATE_CREATED, DATE_MODIFIED, SIZE.
      orderType - OrderType enum element of the order type. Can be ASCENDING, DESCENDING.
      Returns:
      List of files in search result.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.

    • getFilesForSearchName

      List<T> getFilesForSearchName(String directoryPathString, String search, SearchType searchType, boolean recursive, boolean includeFiles, boolean includeDirectories, SortingType sortingType, OrderType orderType) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException
      Gets the file list for specified search parameters.
      Parameters:
      directoryPathString - Path of the directory to search. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      search - search string for file name.
      searchType - SearchType enum element of the search type. Can be: STARTS_WITH, ENDS_WITH, CONTAINS.
      recursive - whether to search recursively.
      includeFiles - whether to include files.
      includeDirectories - whether to include directories.
      sortingType - SortingType enum element of the method of sorting to apply. Possible sorting types (SortingType): NONE, NAME, DATE_CREATED, DATE_MODIFIED, SIZE.
      orderType - OrderType enum element of the order type. Can be ASCENDING, DESCENDING.
      Returns:
      List of files in search result.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.

    • getFilesForSearchNameAndExcludedExtensions

      List<T> getFilesForSearchNameAndExcludedExtensions(String directoryPathString, String search, String searchExcludedExtensionsString, boolean recursive, boolean includeFiles, boolean includeDirectories, SortingType sortingType, OrderType orderType) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException
      Gets the file list for specified search parameters.
      Parameters:
      directoryPathString - Path of the directory to search. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      search - search string for file name.
      searchExcludedExtensionsString - comma delimited string of the extensions to exclude from search.
      recursive - whether to search recursively.
      includeFiles - whether to include files.
      includeDirectories - whether to include directories.
      sortingType - SortingType enum element of the method of sorting to apply. Possible sorting types (SortingType): NONE, NAME, DATE_CREATED, DATE_MODIFIED, SIZE.
      orderType - OrderType enum element of the order type. Can be ASCENDING, DESCENDING.
      Returns:
      List of files in search result.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.

    • getFilesForSearchNameAndExtensions

      List<T> getFilesForSearchNameAndExtensions(String directoryPathString, String search, String searchExtensionsString, boolean recursive, boolean includeFiles, boolean includeDirectories, SortingType sortingType, OrderType orderType) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException
      Gets the file list for specified search parameters.
      Parameters:
      directoryPathString - Path of the directory to search. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      search - search string for file name.
      searchExtensionsString - comma delimited string of the extensions to include in search.
      recursive - whether to search recursively.
      includeFiles - whether to include files.
      includeDirectories - whether to include directories.
      sortingType - SortingType enum element of the method of sorting to apply. Possible sorting types (SortingType): NONE, NAME, DATE_CREATED, DATE_MODIFIED, SIZE.
      orderType - OrderType enum element of the order type. Can be ASCENDING, DESCENDING.
      Returns:
      List of files in search result.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.

    • getFilesForSearchNameAndExtensionsAndExcludedExtensions

      List<T> getFilesForSearchNameAndExtensionsAndExcludedExtensions(String directoryPathString, String search, String searchExtensionsString, String searchExcludedExtensionsString, boolean recursive, boolean includeFiles, boolean includeDirectories, SortingType sortingType, OrderType orderType) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException
      Gets the file list for specified search parameters.
      Parameters:
      directoryPathString - Path of the directory to search. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      search - search string for file name.
      searchExtensionsString - comma delimited string of the extensions to include in search.
      searchExcludedExtensionsString - comma delimited string of the extensions to exclude from search.
      recursive - whether to search recursively.
      includeFiles - whether to include files.
      includeDirectories - whether to include directories.
      sortingType - SortingType enum element of the method of sorting to apply. Possible sorting types (SortingType): NONE, NAME, DATE_CREATED, DATE_MODIFIED, SIZE.
      orderType - OrderType enum element of the order type. Can be ASCENDING, DESCENDING.
      Returns:
      List of files in search result.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.

    • getFilesWithNames

      List<T> getFilesWithNames(String directoryPathString, String searchListString, boolean recursive, boolean includeFiles, boolean includeDirectories, SortingType sortingType, OrderType orderType) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException
      Gets the file list for specified search parameters.
      Parameters:
      directoryPathString - Path of the directory to search. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      searchListString - comma delimited string of the file names to search for.
      recursive - whether to search recursively.
      includeFiles - whether to include files.
      includeDirectories - whether to include directories.
      sortingType - SortingType enum element of the method of sorting to apply. Possible sorting types (SortingType): NONE, NAME, DATE_CREATED, DATE_MODIFIED, SIZE.
      orderType - OrderType enum element of the order type. Can be ASCENDING, DESCENDING.
      Returns:
      List of files in search result.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.

    • moveFiles

      void moveFiles(String filePathsString, String moveDestinationDirectoryString, boolean overwrite) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxFileCountExceededException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxRepositorySizeExceededException
      Move one or more files at the path(s) specified to the destination directory path with the option of overwriting. Multiple paths are delimited with -more-. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      Parameters:
      filePathsString - Path(s) of the file to move. Multiple paths are delimited with -more-. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      moveDestinationDirectoryString - Path to the destination directory. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      overwrite - whether to overwrite existing files or directories.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxFileCountExceededException - if max file count for directory is exceeded.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException - if path starts with a non-existent repository name.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxRepositorySizeExceededException - if max repository size is exceeded.

    • renameFile

      void renameFile(String filePathString, String newFileName) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxFileCountExceededException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.FileExtensionException
      Renames a file or directory at the path specified. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      Parameters:
      filePathString - Path of the file to rename. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      newFileName - new file name.
      Throws:
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - for IO reasons.
      IOException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxFileCountExceededException - if no file exists at path.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if max file count for directory is exceeded.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException - if path starts with a non-existent repository name.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.FileExtensionException - if config has invalid parameters. NoFileAtPathException, IOException, MaxFileCountExceededException, BadPathException, InvalidParameterException, NonExistentRepositoryException, FileExtensionException;

    • updateConfig

      void updateConfig(String repositoryName, String configString, ConfigUpdateType configUpdateType) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException, IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxFileCountExceededException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.ValueInConfigCannotBeLessThanOneException
      Updates the config of specified repository with the specified config.
      Parameters:
      repositoryName - name of the repository whose config to update.
      configString - String representation of custom config. Parameters in config string are delimited by ;. Parameters are split into keys and values by =. Possible parameter keys: maxRepositorySize, excludedExtensions, directoriesWithMaxFileCount. maxRepositorySize is a long of bytes that is the maximum size of specified repository. Example: 1024. excludedExtensions is a comma delimited string of extensions which the program will not allow files to be created with. Example: exe,bat directoriesWithMaxFileCount is a comma delimited list of - delimited string which represent a key value pair of a directory name and the max file count that would be allowed to store inside. Example: dir1-25,dir2-50 Full config string example: maxRepositorySize=2048;excludedExtensions=jar,zip;directoriesWithMaxFileCount=exampleDir1-75,exampleDir2-100 Not all parameters have to be specified. Can be parsed as null in order to create a default config with maxRepositorySize=1073741824.
      configUpdateType - ConfigUpdateTypes enum element of the method of config updating to apply. Possible sorting types (SortingType): REPLACE (replaces existing config values), ADD (adds to existing config values).
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxFileCountExceededException - if max file count for directory is exceeded.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException - if path starts with a non-existent repository name.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.ValueInConfigCannotBeLessThanOneException - if value specified in config is less than one.

    • writeToFile

      void writeToFile(String filePathString, String textToWrite) throws DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException, IOException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxFileCountExceededException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.FileExtensionException, DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxRepositorySizeExceededException
      Writes the specified text to specified file path. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      Parameters:
      filePathString - Path to the file. Paths are slash delimited and should start with a repository name.
      textToWrite - text to write.
      Throws:
      IOException - for IO reasons.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.BadPathException - if path is in a bad format.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NoFileAtPathException - if no file exists at path.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxFileCountExceededException - if max file count for directory is exceeded.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.InvalidParametersException - if parameter(s) are invalid.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.NonExistentRepositoryException - if path starts with a non-existent repository name.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.FileExtensionException - if file has an extension that is forbidden in the config file.
      DirectoryHandlerExceptions.MaxRepositorySizeExceededException - if max repository size is exceeded.
